summary:
**Seinfeld** is an American TV comedy show that aired from 1989 to 1998. It's about Jerry Seinfeld and his friends' everyday life in New York City. The show is famous for focusing on small, funny details. Jerry Seinfeld performs stand-up comedy in each episode.

It was very popular and won many awards. People still love it today, calling it one of the best TV shows ever. Some of its episodes, like "The Soup Nazi," are super famous.
title: Seinfeld
